EXTHT_FAIL_COUNTS

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0xac
Size:
0x4

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:8] - - - -
[7:4] EXTHT_LO_FAIL_COUNT r - -
[3:0] EXTHT_HI_FAIL_COUNT r - -

Field Descriptions

EXTHT_LO_FAIL_COUNT

This field will hold a running count of test failures that contribute to the total alert count. It will be reset after every passing test sequence. If an alert is signaled, this value will persist until it is cleared.

EXTHT_HI_FAIL_COUNT

This field will hold a running count of test failures that contribute to the total alert count. It will be reset after every passing test sequence. If an alert is signaled, this value will persist until it is cleared.
